text:
.
some text
.
some text
.

emphasis:
.
*emphasis*
.
*emphasis*
.

strong:
.
**strong**
.
**strong**
.

literal:
.
``abc``
.
`abc`
.

literal block:
.
::

   literal text

normal text
.
```
literal text
```

normal text
.

block quotes
.
a

    b

    -- attribution

        nested

    - with
    - bullet list

    1. with
    2. enumerated list

c
.
a

> b
>
> <p class="attribution">â€”attribution</p>

> > nested
>
> - with
> - bullet list
>
> 1. with
> 2. enumerated list

c
.

transition:
.
----
.
______________________________________________________________________
.

headings:
.
heading 1
=========

heading 2-1
-----------

heading 3
*********

heading 2-2
-----------
.
# heading 1

## heading 2-1

### heading 3

## heading 2-2
.

bullet list:
.
- a
- b
- c

* d

  * e
  * f

* g
.
- a
- b
- c

* d
  - e
  - f
* g
.

enumerated list:
.
1. a
2. b
3. c

#. d
#. e

11. f
12. g
.
1. a
2. b
3. c
4. d
5. e

11) f
12) g
.

comment:
.
.. This is a comment.

..
   This whole indented block
   is a comment.

   Still in the comment.

.
% This is a comment.

% This whole indented block
% is a comment.
%
% Still in the comment.
.

autolink:
.
http://a.net/
.
<http://a.net/>
.

external link:
.
`Link text <https://domain.invalid/>`_
.
[Link text](https://domain.invalid/)
.

external link definition:
.
This is a paragraph that contains `a link`_.

.. _a link: https://domain.invalid/
.
This is a paragraph that contains [a link].

[a link]: https://domain.invalid/
.

target:
.
.. _a:

ab
==
.
(a)=

# ab
.

footnote:
.
[1]_ [#]_ [*]_

.. [1] normal footnote
   next line
.. [#] auto-number footnote.
.. [*] auto-symbol footnote.
.
[^id4] [^id5] [^id6]

[^id4]: normal footnote
next line

[^id5]: auto-number footnote.

[^id6]: auto-symbol footnote.
.

citation:
.
[a]_

.. [a] citation footnote
   next line

   new paragraph
.
[^cite_a]

[^cite_a]: citation footnote
next line

    new paragraph
.

roles:
.
`a` :b:`c`
.
`a` {b}`c`
.

table, simple:
.
== ==
A  B
== ==
C  D
== ==
.
| A   | B   |
| --- | --- |
| C   | D   |
.

table, nested syntax:
.
===== =============
*A*   http://a.net/
===== =============
``C`` [1]_
===== =============

.. [1] footnote
.
| *A* | <http://a.net/> |
| --- | --------------- |
| `C` | [^id2]          |

[^id2]: footnote
.

table, multi-head:
.
== ==
A  B
X  Y
== ==
C  D
== ==
.
```{eval_rst}
== ==
A  B
X  Y
== ==
C  D
== ==
```
.

front-matter:
.
:Authors:
    Tony J. (Tibs) Ibbs,
    David Goodger

    (and sundry other good-natured folks)

:Version: 1.0 of 2001/08/08
:Dedication: To my father.
:orphan:
.

  Tony J. (Tibs) Ibbs,
  David Goodger

  (and sundry other good-natured folks)

orphan: true
---
.

substitution reference:
.
|sub|
.
{{ sub }}
.

substitution definition:
.
.. |name| replace:: replacement `a`_

.. |caution| image:: warning.png
             :alt: Warning!
.
---
substitutions:
  caution: ''
  name: replacement a
---
.
